content.question:
In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.

a) Describe one difference between changes in women’s political rights in western Europe and eastern Europe during the twentieth century.
b) Explain one way in which European women’s economic roles changed during the twentieth century.
c) Explain one way in which women continued to face social inequalities in Europe during the twentieth century.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
